page.title: 07A Day in my life.(R.Taylor)
page.content: When I first woke up,I washed and put on my School uniform before breakfast of Weetabix and toast.My mother took my brother and me in the car to St Thomas' school. Before school we played Tig until 9a.m. After Assembly and Prayers we had Maths , English and Religious Knowledge. For lunch I had sausage,peas and potatoes followed by a jam doughnut. I went on the field with my friends where we played Bulldog and Sticky Toffee.After Prayers in the afternoon I worked on my topic about flies, followed by some History. I played line tig in the afternoon break and then I read my book. When I went home at 3.30p.m.I had a clarinet lesson before my favourite tea of kebab and chips. I played outside with my friends for a while before my mother called me to go to bed at about 7.30p.m.
